gstat.util

Class Deck<C extends Card>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gstat.util.Deck<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - This requires that any cards to be used with Deck must implement the Card interface

    public class Deck<C extends Card>
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulates a deck of cards. Supports various function that a deck would allow such as drawing, peeking and discarding. Can also function as a discard pile by using the default constructor
    Author:
    Mike Onyszczak

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck()
      Create empty deck with default name "deck", Typically a discard deck
      Deck(java.util.ArrayList<C> deck)
      Creates a fully stocked deck with default name "deck"
      Deck(java.util.ArrayList<C> deck, java.lang.String name)
      Creates a fully stocked deck with user-defined name
      Deck(java.lang.String name)
      Creates an empty deck, Typically a discard deck, with a user-defined name

      • peekTop

        Returns:
